body_html: I removed the shape checks (a2ff968) and added some unit tests (68c874a) -- both with known and unknown ranks of the inputs and outputs at the graph construction time and it seems to work. However, again this required taking out a lot of the shape-checking -- so not sure if we want to keep it as it is, or bring the checks back in. The unit tests would error out if the shape checks are included, hence the tests were not added to to the rnn_test.py file.

body: I removed the shape checks (a2ff968) and added some unit tests (68c874a) -- both with known and unknown ranks of the inputs and outputs at the graph construction time and it seems to work. However, again this required taking out a lot of the shape-checking -- so not sure if we want to keep it as it is, or bring the checks back in. The unit tests would error out if the shape checks are included, hence the tests were not added to to the rnn_test.py file.
